mapper.select: select idx, board_idx, content, user_nick, user_id, wdate, comment_group, step, indent, available from story_comment natural join member where board_idx=#{idx} order by comment_group asc, indent asc, wdate asc
mapper.insert: insert into story_comment values(story_board_comment_seq.nextval, #{board_idx}, #{content}, #{user_id}, sysdate, story_board_Comment_Group_seq.nextval, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.update: update story_comment set content=#{content} where idx=#{idx}
update story_comment set available=1 where idx=#{idx}
mapper.select: select count(idx) from story_comment where board_idx=#{idx}
select user_id from story_comment where idx = #{idx}

select num, good, c.idx, content, m.user_nick ,c.board_idx from (select inner.*, rownum num from (select count(good) good, comment_idx from story_comment_recommend r, story_comment c where r.comment_idx = c.idx and good=1 and available=0 group by comment_idx order by good desc) inner) a, member m, story_comment c where m.user_id = c.user_id and c.idx = a.comment_idx and num between 1 and 5 order by num

select num, good,bad, c.idx, content, m.user_nick ,c.board_idx, c.wdate from (select inner.*, rownum num from (select count(good) good, comment_idx from story_comment_recommend r, story_comment c where r.comment_idx = c.idx and good=1 and available=0 and c.board_idx = #{idx} group by comment_idx order by good desc) inner) a, member m, story_comment c, (select count(bad) bad, comment_idx from story_comment_recommend r, story_comment c where r.comment_idx = c.idx and bad=1 and available=0 and c.board_idx = #{idx} group by comment_idx) d where m.user_id = c.user_id and c.idx = a.comment_idx and c.idx = d.comment_idx(+) and num between 1 and 3 order by num
